content.prompt: Suppose all three capacitors have charge +Q on the top plate and charge â€“Q on the bottom plate.Which of the following is true of the potential difference across the plates of the three capacitors?

choices.label: It is the same for II and III and least for I.
It is the same for all three capacitors.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
